Package org.hibernate.search.engine.search.highlighter.dsl

Interface HighlighterBoundaryScannerOptionsStep<T extends HighlighterBoundaryScannerOptionsStep<?,?>,N extends HighlighterOptionsStep<?>>

All Superinterfaces:
HighlighterBoundaryScannerFinalStep<N>
All Known Subinterfaces:
HighlighterBoundaryScannerFastVectorHighlighterOptionsStep<T>
public interface HighlighterBoundaryScannerOptionsStep<T extends HighlighterBoundaryScannerOptionsStep<?,?>,N extends HighlighterOptionsStep<?>> extends HighlighterBoundaryScannerFinalStep<N>
The step in a highlighter definition where the boundary scanner options can be set. Refer to your particular backend documentation for more detailed information on the exposed settings.
